explains: adj. 魔法的，魔术的；神奇的，迷人的

sentences.en: Her words had a magical effect on us.
sentences.cn: 她的话对我们有一种魔力般的作用。

sentences.en: The beautiful island of Bermuda is a magical place to get married.
sentences.cn: 美丽的百慕大岛是缔结良缘的神奇之地。

sentences.en: The magical rock shapes are made by human beings.
sentences.cn: 这种神奇的岩石形状是人为制造的。
